SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.image.core.channel.convert.attached.histogram

Class QuantileIntensityFromHistogram

Object
QuantileIntensityFromHistogram
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelConverterAttached<Histogram,UnsignedByteBuffer>
public class QuantileIntensityFromHistogram extends Object implements ChannelConverterAttached<Histogram,UnsignedByteBuffer>
Converts a Channel to UnsignedByteBuffer by scaling against a quantile of the intensity values from a corresponding histogram.

Specifically, the range is from 0 to calculate_quantile(intensity, quantile) across all voxels.

Author:
Owen Feehan
